title: QuoteColo_Sean
author: QuoteColo_Sean
content: Hey everyone, My name is Sean and I work for the company QuoteColo. We are a no cost referral service that provides clients with direct quotes and contacts for crypto mining needs via email. We are partnered with hosting facilities all across the United States and are looking to find more partners in Canada. If anyone has had previous experience with Canadian colocation facilities, I would greatly appreciate the connect. Thank you!
